title: How much power do I need for my PC? - Quora

response.answer_text: To answer this, we need a detailed list of components. Such as: What CPU? What Brand and model GPU? (not all GPUs from the same brand and even model draw the same power as some are overclocked variants) What RAM? How many storage devices? How many fans? What cooling solution is installed? Any extra internal lighting? What peripherals are connected?
